validation-result.default:
Validation failed\. Your identity is not validated\.
[Validation results]({report-link})
Don't give up, what doesn't kill you makes you stronger\. Check the validation results to understand the reasons of failure and join the next validation for better results\.
To join the next validation, you need a new invitation code\.
validation-result.candidate: Validation failed\. Your identity status is {identity-state}\. To keep your identity validated, attend the next validation ceremony\.🗓[Add validation to your calendar]({calendar-link})
